title: Bug 116744Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: When the dynamic text element's Content Type property is set to Auto, Plain, or HTML, the report displays the same results.
EB:
I expect the report to display different results depending on the dynamic text element's Content Type property: 

- When set to Plain, I expect the literal content (tags and all) to be displayed. 
- When set to Auto, I expect content 1, 2 and 3 to appear properly without HTML or RTF tags. 
- When set to HTML, I expect content 1 and 2 to appear properly without HTML tags, and content 3 to appear literally with RTF tags.
SR:
Please refer to the attached report and follow these steps to reproduce the issue:

1. Open the report.
2. Set the dynamic text element's Content Type property to Plain.
3. Observe the displayed content.
4. Change the dynamic text element's Content Type property to Auto.
5. Observe the displayed content.
6. Finally, change the dynamic text element's Content Type property to HTML and observe the displayed content again.
